description: This is a React component source file for a Next.js application. It implements a page that fetches and displays candidate matches for a particular job, allowing filtering by minimum score and providing actions like viewing profiles and inviting candidates.

methods.name: MatchesContent
methods.description: React functional component that displays a list of candidate matches for a given job, with filter options and refresh capability.

methods.name: EmployerMatchesPage
methods.description: Next.js page component that wraps MatchesContent with suspense fallback for loading state.
